En.myDescribe: I develop various application software. I specialize in development for mobile devices (Android) and Web. Software development experience since 2014. Worked with server path of different application. Intermediate english level. I am student now (ITMO university)
En.csharpDescribeStack: Work experience 3 years. Usually I use ASP.NET or Unity. Strong language skills
En.javaDescribeStack: Work experience 3 years. Used to write android applications before Kotlin. Strong language skills
En.kotlinDescribeStack: Work experience: 1 year. For some time I use as the main language android development. Strong language skills
En.javascriptDescribeStack: Work experience: 1 year. Used to write frontend parts of web applications and for the backend part in NodeJS. Average language proficiency
En.pythonDescribeStack: Work experience: 1 year. Used to write neural networks and work with Django. Average language proficiency
En.phpDescribeStack: Work experience: 1 year. I use for web applications. Initial knowledge of the language
En.webDescribeStack: Work experience: 1 year. Developed own site and rules existing for a pair of projects
En.cppDescribeStack: Work experience 3 years. Used only for olympiad tasks in programming. Initial knowledge of the language

Rus.myDescribe: Разрабатываю различное прикладное программное обеспечение. Специализируюсь на разработке для мобильных устройств (Android) и Web приложениях. Опыт разработки ПО с 2014 года. Есть опыт работы с клиент-северными приложениями и понимание как работать с HTTP/S, REST API, XML, JSON и т.д. Часто писал в android приложение + backend. В проектировании архитектуры использую clean architecture и здравый смысл. В качестве UI паттернов MVVM, MVP. На данный момент студент(3 курс) в (ITMO)
Rus.cppDescribeStack: Использовал только для олимпиадных задач по программирванию и прикладных расчетов. Начальное владение языком
